name: Royal Dice
description:
Click and roll, may luck be on your side as you take your birth right (a royal roll) all the way to the throne. 

Goal:

You want to roll better than your opponent in hopes to overtake them in a bout of strength. You will gain power with each fight and end with a battle against the king.

As you play special abilities will be given, but watch out your enemies have some tricks up their sleeves as well.

Power up overview:
reroll: re-rolls 1's

dmgAdd: adds + 1 to all die under 6

dmgSafe: removes 1 form all die on enemy

doubles: rolls an extra die

splash: splashes back a fraction of damage take to enemy on roll

rage: adds 1 to total damage per turn  capped at +3

Royal Crit Explained:

On a 6 roll another dice

At 3 6's win that fight Immediately
